subject_terms_3: Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from a publication. The title is printed in the middle of the page. There are two black-and-white advertisements on the left most column of the publication. There are two black-and-white photographs at the top of the page, with their respective captions below them. The edges of the paper is slightly torn, especially on the right.
title_text: The Orient From Here and There - Evolution of Radio
